snippet: The FiveThirtyEight forecast of Maryland projects Mr. Romney to win there by 23 points, and Rick Santorum isn't even on the ballot in the District of Columbia.
abstract: The FiveThirtyEight forecast of Maryland projects Mr. Romney to win there by 23 points, and Rick Santorum isn't even on the ballot in the District of Columbia.

headline.main: Romney Could Net 50 Delegates From Maryland and D.C.
